title: User-Centric Data Access Control – User-Initiated Consent Management Interface
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a user-initiated consent management interface so that my clients can actively manage their data access and sharing preferences while ensuring their privacy is respected.

title: Intuitive User Interface Design – Simplified Navigation for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a visually guided dashboard that allows me to quickly access critical health monitoring and communication tasks so that I can efficiently manage multiple clients without confusion or delay.

title: Real-Time Health Data Synchronization – Manual Refresh Option for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to manually refresh client health data at my discretion so that I can ensure a calm environment for my clients before reviewing sensitive information.

title: Comprehensive User Training Resources – Step-by-Step Guides for Common Tasks
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want easy access to step-by-step guides for common tasks related to health monitoring and data privacy so that I can efficiently manage client care without overwhelming my clients or myself.

title: Multi-Channel Notification System for Health Alerts
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to receive timely and context-sensitive health alerts from the system so that I can monitor my clients' health effectively without causing them unnecessary stress or confusion.

title: Secure Client Data Management
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to control when and how client health data is accessed and shared, so that I can ensure privacy and maintain a calm environment for my clients.

title: Adaptive Learning and Support for Caregiving
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to adaptively adjust its interface based on my caregiving context and the specific needs of my clients so that I can efficiently manage health monitoring and communication without overwhelming my clients.
